trans-unit.source: An error has occurred!
The extension "%s" is required for %s!
No TypoScript config found for Formhandler! Please add the static template or write your own configuration.
Insufficient config for %s!
The PHP version you are using is too low. The error check "emailExists" is not available on your system. Please remove it from your TypoScript configuration.
Missing %s! The Flexform contains '%s' but typoscript configuration is incomplete. Please add : %s
Missing config for %s! Please provide a '%s' either in the TypoScript configuration or in the Flexfom.
No template for PDF found! Make sure subpart ###TEMPLATE_PDF### exists in your HTML template file!
No table configured for %s!
No driver configured for %s!
No fields mapping configured for %s! Make sure the block "fields" is defined in TyposScript for this component!
No template file found!
No template file found. Check your TypoScript setup and/or your plugin settings and make sure you defined a template file!
Template file "%s" not found!
Template file "%s" is empty!
Template file "%s" does not contain a subpart ###TEMPLATE_ and therefore is not a valid template!
Your request seems to be a spamming attempt, so it was blocked! This may have been a mistake by the system. Please try again!
The auth code is invalid!
Insufficient parameters! Unable to validate the auth code!
No matching auth code found!
Updating your data failed! Please try again.
Configuration is not valid for field "%s"! Fieldname found in section "fieldConf" of Validator_Default, but there is no setting "errorCheck" defined!
Error check missing! Your setup misses error check "%s" for the field "%s"!
Form field name missing for error check "%s"!
No parameters found for error check "%s" although "%s" is mandatory!
Parameter "%s" for error check "%s" not found although it is mandatory!

The configured "maxSize" (%s) for the field "%s" is bigger than the allowed max upload size configured in php.ini (%s). For more information see: http://www.php.net/manual/en/ini.core.php#ini.upload-max-filesize!
Database connection failed: %s
